experience.title: IMAGE PROCESSING WORKSHOP
experience.description: Successfully completed the seven-day workshop IEEE certified workshop in Image processing conducted by Technology Robotix Society, IIT Kharagpur. OpenCV library was applied to perform various image modifications like increasing its brightness, detecting blobs and Hough transform. A robot was made to traverse a path detected from an image. A face recognition algorithm was implemented to detect human faces from a video.

projects: [{"title":"Deep Learning foundaions and applications ","start_date":"Jan 2020","end_date":"Present","description":"• Worked on multiple modules based on deep learning networks like CNN, RNN, GRU and LSTM.• Successfully completed multiple assignments based on applying deep learning network models onFashionMNIST and multi-class natural image classification data cifar10."},{"title":"Identification and Prediction of Sleeping Beauties in nature","start_date":"Jul 2019","end_date":"Present","description":"Mentor: Prof. Animesh Mukherjee , Associate Professor, Department of Computer Science and Engineering IIT Kharagpur.A paper is termed as sleeping beauty if it remains dormant for many years but suddenly starts receiving a large no. of incitations, I am predicting the probability of a paper to be a sleeping beauty and it’s “sleep time”, Scraped data from various APIs to gather 46947044 data points, important columns of incitations, outcitation, year of publication, etc were recognized using feature selection techniques, further mapped the data columns with primary Ids allotted, Graphically analyzed the data using matplotlib and seaborn to get the avg. Incitation per paper of 3.778 and made the matrix of author id and years of publication"},{}]
